# chirimoya-theme

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                        | Type                | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `theme`  | `theme`   | indicates the theme of the library | `"dark" \| "light"` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event         | Description                      | Type                             |
| ------------- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| `themeChange` | fires whenever the theme changes | `CustomEvent<"dark" \| "light">` |
